about_the_game:
In a world where food safety is considered paramount, where rarely anyone touches food that has not been thoroughly tested by reputable auditors beforehand.

You start your journey to become a highly rated Direct-To-Customer Farmer, who supplies crops and animal produce on order.

A highly lucrative career as illustrated by the list of wealthiest people in the world, where 7 out of the top 10 are direct-to-customer farmers.

You used all your savings to buy a beautiful farm on a faraway island and open a Farmer's Account with a reputable auditing company, Factoria, a mega corporation with their hands in everything from dining in air, to mining underwater, to auditing edible and non edible items.

Now, with an account which gives you access to customers and mere pennies left in hand, it's all on you to reach the top of the farming world.

  • Grow variety of crops as your heart wants.
  • Play around with and take care of your farm animals.
  • Take Direct-To-Customer farming jobs from Factoria and supply crops & animal produce on order.
  • Complete Factoria Jobs on time to get great reviews on your Farmer's Profile and increase your Factoria Farmer Ranking or Get Penalized for Late, Incomplete or Sub-Standard Job Completion by reducing profits and lowering your Factoria Farmer Ranking
  • Reinvest in your farm
  • Enjoy seasons pass by with seasonal music

----------

Vrushank's Note :

Thanks a lot for your interest in Crescent Lands!

Just wanted to let you know that the game is under heavy development and everything about it other than it being a farming game is subject to change before public release.

The screenshots currently on the store page were taken when the game used Unity but now it's using Unreal Engine as it's game engine.

So, because of having to redo everything again in Unreal Engine, the game has changed significantly along the way in aesthetics and overall quality.

I will upload the new screenshots as soon as possible so that you can get a look at the new and improved game.

Hopefully you will stick around until then by Wishlisting Crescent Lands!
detailed_description:
In a world where food safety is considered paramount, where rarely anyone touches food that has not been thoroughly tested by reputable auditors beforehand.

You start your journey to become a highly rated Direct-To-Customer Farmer, who supplies crops and animal produce on order.

A highly lucrative career as illustrated by the list of wealthiest people in the world, where 7 out of the top 10 are direct-to-customer farmers.

You used all your savings to buy a beautiful farm on a faraway island and open a Farmer's Account with a reputable auditing company, Factoria, a mega corporation with their hands in everything from dining in air, to mining underwater, to auditing edible and non edible items.

Now, with an account which gives you access to customers and mere pennies left in hand, it's all on you to reach the top of the farming world.

  • Grow variety of crops as your heart wants.
  • Play around with and take care of your farm animals.
  • Take Direct-To-Customer farming jobs from Factoria and supply crops & animal produce on order.
  • Complete Factoria Jobs on time to get great reviews on your Farmer's Profile and increase your Factoria Farmer Ranking or Get Penalized for Late, Incomplete or Sub-Standard Job Completion by reducing profits and lowering your Factoria Farmer Ranking
  • Reinvest in your farm
  • Enjoy seasons pass by with seasonal music

----------

Vrushank's Note :

Thanks a lot for your interest in Crescent Lands!

Just wanted to let you know that the game is under heavy development and everything about it other than it being a farming game is subject to change before public release.

The screenshots currently on the store page were taken when the game used Unity but now it's using Unreal Engine as it's game engine.

So, because of having to redo everything again in Unreal Engine, the game has changed significantly along the way in aesthetics and overall quality.

I will upload the new screenshots as soon as possible so that you can get a look at the new and improved game.

Hopefully you will stick around until then by Wishlisting Crescent Lands!
name: Crescent Lands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit), Windows 11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5600X, Intel i5 12400f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Crescent Lands is a 3D Farming Sim in which the players strive to create a reputable farm. Customize your character, Produce whatever your heart wants, Nurture your farm animals, Have a chat and Take on jobs to deliver produce within the job's time limit or be slapped with a penalty for being tardy.
